description: This version of the  Person Playing Handball emoji has the  Light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Pale Skin Tone on supported
apple_vendor_description: The person playing handball emoji on Apple devices is depicted with a light skin tone, embodying energetic movement and sport. Their body is captured in a dynamic pose, mid-throw, with the ball poised to leave their hand, showcasing Apple's commitment to realistic action and smooth, rounded forms.  The subtle gradients and lighting on their athletic wear suggest a sense of motion and athletic prowess, perfect for communicating themes of teamwork, competition, or physical activity.
